name: Arranging The Deckchairs
description:
Arranging Deckchairs

(On the titanic)

Submission for Ludum Dare 48

Jam Category - Theme "Unstable"

Use Arrow Keys or WSAD to move and jump

Spacebar to pick up deckchairs 

Shift to throw them

Assets used

Music:

 "The Accordion Sample IV"

by Spring Spring

https://opengameart.org/content/the-accordion-sample-iv
